com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class ImagePicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.VisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidViewComponent
        • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.ButtonBase
          • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.Picker
            • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.ImagePicker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActivityResultListener, Component

    public class ImagePicker
extends Picker
implements ActivityResultListener
    Component enabling a user to select an image from the phone's gallery.
    Author:
    halabelson@google.com (Hal Abelson)

      • resultReturned

        public void resultReturned(int requestCode,
                           int resultCode,
                           Intent data)
        Callback method to get the result returned by the image picker activity
        Specified by:
        resultReturned in interface ActivityResultListener
        Parameters:
        requestCode - a code identifying the request.
        resultCode - a code specifying success or failure of the activity
        data - the returned data, in this case an Intent whose data field contains the image's content URI.
